maintenanceAgency.agencyName: Alexander Turnbull Library, Wellington, New Zealand

conventionDeclaration.citation: International Standard Archival Authority Record for Corporate Bodies, Person and Families, 2nd Edit

source.sourceEntry: "Our History". 'National Library of New Zealand'. https://natlib.govt.nz/about-us/our-history accessed 2 August 2018

biogHist.p: National Library Act (1965) brought together the General Assembly Library, the Alexander Turnbull Library and the National Library Service to form the National Library of New Zealand. Located at Molesworth Street, Wellington. Building officially opened in August 1987.
